overview:
“Sanjeev leads the development staff at LTSave. He brings more than twenty years of technical expertise to LTSave and plays a key role in engineering the technology capabilities of LTSave.

From 2000 to 2003, Sanjeev was the CTO at Net-Fast, Inc. a software company developing Business Intelligence Web-based solutions for the healthcare industry. He was responsible for the company’s overall technology strategy from the design of its architecture to the investigation and implementation of new technologies, and managed both a domestic and offshore development teams. Prior to Net-Fast, Sanjeev has held software management and architect positions at Webhire Inc., ADE Corporation, Thomson Financial and NewsEDGE Corp.

Sanjeev obtained his BSME from Howard University in 1983.”

(Source: Invesra)
